summary: An ordinance relating to zoning and providing for the rezoning of portions of Blocks 34, 35, 39 and 40 in Woodland Addition to Salmon Bay City and portions of Blocks 2, 6, 7, 12, 13 and 20 in Porterfield's Addition, with respect to Use and Area Districts, and amending Ordinance No. 45382, as amended, by adding thereto two new sections numbered 2-166 and 17-119, respectively.
